plans.name: Basic
plans.description: Get notifications on the best times to charge your car to save money and finish charging when you need to leave.
plans.details: Get smart notifications everyday to optimize your charging schedule.
features: Smart notifications for optimal charging times
Save ~$5 in charging cost every month
Know when to charge your car every day
plans.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-12 w-12 text-teal-500" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15 17h5l-1.405-1.405A2.032 2.032 0 0118 14.158V11a6.002 6.002 0 00-4-5.659V5a2 2 0 10-4 0v.341C7.67 6.165 6 8.388 6 11v3.159c0 .538-.214 1.055-.595 1.436L4 17h5m6 0v1a3 3 0 11-6 0v-1m6 0H9"></path></svg>

plans.name: Advanced
plans.description: An automatic charger that saves you money, keeps your EV healthy, and makes sure your car is charged and ready for you everyday.
plans.details: Receive a smart charger with the ability to customize it's behavior to fit your lifestyle.
features: Save ~$15 in charging cost every month
Have a charged car every single day
Add years to your EV battery's lifespan over time
